siteMetadata.title: Blog by Bedford West
siteMetadata.subtitle: Software Engineer and Indie Game Dev Enthusiast.

frontmatter.title: An Experiment with Arch and i3 Tiling Window Manager - Part 3
frontmatter.description: Part 3 of a technology log of installing Arch Linux and the i3 Tiling Window Manager. In this article I wrap things up and show a final build screenshot.

frontmatter.title: An Experiment with Arch and i3 Tiling Window Manager - Part 2
frontmatter.description: Part 2 of a technology log of installing Arch Linux and the i3 Tiling Window Manager. In this article I work through some difficulties with proprietary drivers and display management.

frontmatter.title: An Experiment with Arch and i3 Tiling Window Manager - Part 1
frontmatter.description: Part 1 of a technology log of installing Arch Linux and the i3 Tiling Window Manager. In this article I describe some roadblocks with installing Xorg packages for the tiling manager.

frontmatter.title: An Experiment with Arch and i3 Tiling Window Manager - Intro
frontmatter.description: Introduction article to a technology log of installing Arch Linux and the i3 Tiling Window Manager.
